UI_FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
UI_FAQ.q1: How do I add a vehicle to the list?
UI_FAQ.a1: Select a nation and branch, then click on a vehicle.
UI_FAQ.q2: What is the discount calculation for?
UI_FAQ.a2: It shows how much you need to save for a sale.
UI_FAQ.a3: You can choose whether to calculate only the vehicle or crew training too.
UI_FAQ.a4: Yes, there's an Export button on the List page.
UI_FAQ.a5: Use the language switcher in the top right corner.
